Bash Command: cat /proc/$(pidof procname)/maps | awk '{print $6}' | grep '\.so' | sort | uniq
Description: List all shared libraries (*.so) loaded by a given process
List all open files by a given process
SCP command to copy file from remote host to local

Bash Command: while true; do free -m; sleep 2; done
Description: Run free command every 2 seconds forever. watch command also relevant
